==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|に|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From [[小]] (''shō'', "small," "little") + [[児]] (''ni'', "small child")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうに|kyu=小兒}}

# [[young]] [[child]], [[infant]]

====Compounds====
* [[小児科]] (''shōnika''): pediatrics
* [[小児病]] (''shōnibyō''): childhood diseases
* [[小児科医]] (''shōnikai''): pediatrician
* [[小児性愛]] (''shōni seiai''): pedophilia
* [[小児病院]] (''shōni byōin''): children's hospital
* [[小児麻酔]] (''shōni masui''): pediatric anesthesia
* [[小児麻痺]] (''shōni mahi''): polio; infantile paralysis
* [[小児喘息]] (''shōni zensoku''): infantile asthma
* [[脳性小児麻痺]] (''nōsei shōni mahi''): cerebral palsy
* [[仮性小児コレラ]] (''kasei shōni korera''): infantile pseudocholera
* [[脊髄性小児麻痺]] (sekizui sei shōni mahi''): polio
